title: Kog Maw should keep his Attack Speed on W

replies.body: I mean they could just revery him to before the ADC changes in preseason when he was in a good spot, not good not bad.. just his own.
That's what they are doing...They're reverting his Q and W to what they were before the change

It was originally on his Q to begin with, then got moved to his W after the update, then got completely removed after how broken it made him (passive attack speed on top of doubling his AS already)

It's on his Q because they want you to feel rewarded for leveling it up, since right now most people don't put a point in his Q until level 13

> [{quoted}](name=Zane Zephyr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Kn2nBEkP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-13T12:07:24.644+0000)
> It's on his Q because they want you to feel rewarded for leveling it up, since right now most people don't put a point in his Q until level 13

http://th64.photobucket.com/albums/h173/Random_Villian/Tumblrrr/th_tumblr_lebsb5U6dB1qcubjz.gif

The reason for the change is a) that's how it was before his mini-rework during the ADC update and b) one of the main issues with Kog is that he has so much power loaded into his w that his other abilities have to be incredibly weak to compensate, which makes him difficult to balance.
